Class AbstractServerWebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.asity.websocket.AbstractServerWebSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerWebSocket
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtmosphereServerWebSocket, GrizzlyServerWebSocket, JwaServerWebSocket, NettyServerWebSocket, VertxServerWebSocket

    public abstract class AbstractServerWebSocket
extends Object
implements ServerWebSocket
    Abstract base class for ServerWebSocket.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

      • onclose

        public ServerWebSocket onclose(Action<Void> action)
        Description copied from interface: ServerWebSocket
        Attaches an action for the close event. After this event, the instance shouldn't be used and all the other events will be disabled.
        Specified by:
        onclose in interface ServerWebSocket

      • onerror

        public ServerWebSocket onerror(Action<Throwable> action)
        Description copied from interface: ServerWebSocket
        Attaches an action to handle error from various things. Its exact behavior is platform-specific and error created by the platform is propagated.
        Specified by:
        onerror in interface ServerWebSocket
